name: Micro Mutators
description:
Microwaves are not Safe!

Pop a burger or taco into this weird microwave. Next thing you know, there's crab claws sticking out of it!

Don't let the weird looks fool you, crabby patties and mutant tacos taste delicious! But remember not to give it too much radiation...

Made in 2 days for Ludum Dare Discord Weekend Jam #5

Update Log: fixed volume slider, UI for infinite game mode, graphics for Web Version

The Team
